page.title: 11PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: Some years ago the cross was at the centre of Cotgrave.This is where the roads to Nottingham,Plumtree,Stragglethorpe,Cro pwell Bishop and Colston Bassett all lead.Around the cross are the church,the village school,the post office,shop,two public houses and a garage.People could walk along the road in those days because there was very little traffic.Cars were expensive and only very rich people could afford them.Up until late in the nineteenth century the drains of the village were all open and ran into each other at the cross.There used to be a cart bridge for carts to cross over them.Now,the roads are very busy.Although people wrote about the cross,we do not know what the old cross looked like.
